verses.verse: The burden <S%H4853><s%> of the word <S%H1697><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> upon the land <S%H776><s%> of Hadrach <S%H2317><s%>, and Damascus <S%H1834><s%> shall be its resting-place <S%H4496><s%> (for the eye <S%H5869><s%> of man <S%H120><s%> and of all the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> is toward Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>);
and Hamath <S%H2574><s%>, also <S%H1379><s%>, which bordereth thereon <S%H6865><s%>; Tyre and Sidon <S%H6721><s%>, because they are very <S%H3966><s%> wise <S%H2449><s%>.

And Tyre <S%H6865><s%> did build <S%H1129><s%> herself a stronghold <S%H4692><s%>, and heaped up <S%H6651><s%> silver <S%H3701><s%> as the dust <S%H6083><s%>, and fine gold <S%H2742><s%> as the mire <S%H2916><s%> of the streets <S%H2351><s%>.

Behold <S%H136><s%>, the Lord will dispossess <S%H3423><s%> her <S%H5221><s%>, and he will smite her power <S%H2428><s%> in the sea <S%H3220><s%>; and she shall be devoured <S%H398><s%> with fire <S%H784><s%>.

Ashkelon <S%H831><s%> shall see <S%H7200><s%> it <S%H3372><s%>, and fear; Gaza <S%H5804><s%> also <S%H3966><s%>, and shall be sore pained <S%H2342><s%>; and Ekron <S%H6138><s%>, for her expectation <S%H4007><s%> shall be put to shame <S%H3001><s%>; and the king <S%H4428><s%> shall perish <S%H6><s%> from Gaza <S%H5804><s%>, and Ashkelon <S%H831><s%> shall not be inhabited <S%H3427><s%>.
And a bastard <S%H4464><s%> shall dwell <S%H3427><s%> in Ashdod <S%H795><s%>, and I will cut off <S%H3772><s%> the pride <S%H1347><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%>.

And I will take away <S%H5493><s%> his blood <S%H1818><s%> out of his mouth <S%H6310><s%>, and his abominations <S%H8251><s%> from between his teeth <S%H8127><s%>; and he also shall be a remnant <S%H7604><s%> for our God <S%H430><s%>; and he shall be as a chieftain <S%H441><s%> in Judah <S%H3063><s%>, and Ekron <S%H6138><s%> as a Jebusite <S%H2983><s%>.

And I will encamp <S%H2583><s%> about my house <S%H1004><s%> against the army <S%H4675><s%>, that none pass through <S%H5674><s%> or return <S%H7725><s%>; and no oppressor <S%H5065><s%> shall pass through <S%H5674><s%> them any more <S%H7200><s%>: for now have I seen with mine eyes <S%H5869><s%>.

Rejoice <S%H1523><s%> greatly <S%H3966><s%>, O daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Zion <S%H6726><s%>; shout <S%H7321><s%>, O daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>: behold <S%H4428><s%>, thy king cometh <S%H935><s%> unto thee <S%H6662><s%>; he is just, and having salvation <S%H3467><s%>; lowly <S%H6041><s%>, and riding <S%H7392><s%> upon an ass <S%H2543><s%>, even upon a colt <S%H5895><s%> the foal <S%H1121><s%> of an ass <S%H860><s%>.

And I will cut off <S%H3772><s%> the chariot <S%H7393><s%> from Ephraim <S%H669><s%>, and the horse <S%H5483><s%> from Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>; and the battle <S%H4421><s%> bow <S%H7198><s%> shall be cut off <S%H3772><s%>; and he shall speak <S%H1696><s%> peace <S%H7965><s%> unto the nations <S%H1471><s%>: and his dominion <S%H4915><s%> shall be from sea <S%H3220><s%> to sea <S%H3220><s%>, and from the River <S%H5104><s%> to the ends <S%H657><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>.

As for thee also <S%H1818><s%>, because of the blood of thy covenant <S%H1285><s%> I have set free <S%H7971><s%> thy prisoners <S%H615><s%> from the pit <S%H953><s%> wherein is no water <S%H4325><s%>.

Turn <S%H7725><s%> you to the stronghold <S%H1225><s%>, ye prisoners <S%H615><s%> of hope <S%H8615><s%>: even to-day <S%H3117><s%> do I declare <S%H5046><s%> that I will render <S%H7725><s%> double unto thee <S%H4932><s%>.

For I have bent <S%H1869><s%> Judah <S%H3063><s%> for me <S%H4390><s%>, I have filled the bow <S%H7198><s%> with Ephraim <S%H669><s%>; and I will stir up <S%H5782><s%> thy sons <S%H1121><s%>, O Zion <S%H6726><s%>, against thy sons <S%H1121><s%>, O Greece <S%H3120><s%>, and will make <S%H7760><s%> thee as the sword <S%H2719><s%> of a mighty man <S%H1368><s%>.

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> shall be seen <S%H7200><s%> over them <S%H2671><s%>; and his arrow shall go forth <S%H3318><s%> as the lightning <S%H1300><s%>; and the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%> will blow <S%H8628><s%> the trumpet <S%H7782><s%>, and will go <S%H1980><s%> with whirlwinds <S%H5591><s%> of the south <S%H8486><s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> will defend <S%H1598><s%> them <S%H398><s%>; and they shall devour, and shall tread down <S%H3533><s%> the sling <S%H7050><s%> - stones <S%H68><s%>; and they shall drink <S%H8354><s%>, and make a noise <S%H1993><s%> as through wine <S%H3196><s%>; and they shall be filled <S%H4390><s%> like bowls <S%H4219><s%>, like the corners <S%H2106><s%> of the altar <S%H4196><s%>.

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> their God <S%H430><s%> will save <S%H3467><s%> them in that day <S%H3117><s%> as the flock <S%H6629><s%> of his people <S%H5971><s%>; for they shall be as the stones <S%H68><s%> of a crown <S%H5145><s%>, lifted on high <S%H5264><s%> over his land <S%H127><s%>.

For how great is his goodness <S%H2898><s%>, and how great is his beauty <S%H3308><s%>! grain <S%H1715><s%> shall make the young men <S%H970><s%> flourish <S%H5107><s%>, and new wine <S%H8492><s%> the virgins <S%H1330><s%>.
